src:
持续经营能力成疑 Scomi Energy挫跌
01 Nov 2019, 02:47 by Chong Jin Hun
（吉隆坡1日讯）Scomi Energy Services Bhd昨日触犯大马交易所PN17上市条例后，今早挫跌2.5仙或28%，至6.5仙。
此外，Scomi Energy昨日向马交所报备，外部审计师毕马威（KPMG PLT）对该公司的持续经营能力表示了重大不确定性。
“外部审计师毕马威，对公司截至2019年6月杪财政年经审核财务报表，发表持续经营能力存在重大不确定，以及股东基金占发行股本的50%或更少。”
Scomi Energy指出：“我们谨此通知，公司将向马交所提出申请，豁免被列为受影响的上市发行人。我们会相应地就进一步发展作出必要公告。”
截至10时30分，该股报6.5仙，共2150万5400股成交，是主要热门股之一。
（编译：陈慧珊）

English version：
Scomi Energy falls as auditor flags uncertainty

Via theedgemarkets.com
text:
Sustained ability to continue to operate Scomi Energy fell
01 Nov 2019, 02:47 by Chong Jin Hun
KUALA LUMPUR (April 1): Scomi Energy Services Bhd fell 2.5 cents or 28% to 6.5 cents this morning after breaking the listing regulations of the Bursa Malaysia PN17.
In addition, Scomi Energy reported to the Malaysian Exchange yesterday that the external auditor KPMG PLT expressed significant uncertainty about the company's ability to continue as a going concern.
“External auditor KPMG has significant uncertainties regarding the company’s audited financial statements for the financial year ending June 2019, and that shareholders’ funds account for 50% or less of the issued share capital.”
Scomi Energy pointed out: "We would like to inform you that the company will apply to the Malaysian Stock Exchange for exemption from being listed as an affected listed issuer. We will make the necessary announcements for further development accordingly."
As of 10:30, the stock reported 6.5 sen, a total of 21.5 million 5400 shares, is one of the main hot stocks.
(Compile: Chen Huishan)

English version:
Scomi Energy falls as auditor flags uncertainty

Via theedgemarkets.com
